survey_name: Outdoor Recreation Participation and Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand participation rates, preferences, and barriers related to outdoor recreational activities among adults.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you participate in outdoor recreational activities (e.g., hiking, cycling, camping)?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button grid for clarity. Consider randomizing options to avoid order bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons), mandatory response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you participate in outdoor recreational activities (e.g., hiking, cycling, camping)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following outdoor activities have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participants.

script.question_text: Which of the following outdoor activities have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your choice of outdoor recreational activities?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one activity in Q2
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections but limit to 3 choices to prioritize key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections), include 'Other' with open-text field.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your choice of outdoor recreational activities?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one activity in Q2

questions.question_text: Please describe any barriers that prevent you from participating in outdoor activities more frequently.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field with a 200-character limit to encourage concise responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any barriers that prevent you from participating in outdoor activities more frequently.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to try a new outdoor recreational activity in the next 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with clear polarity labels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons), mandatory response.

script.question_text: How likely are you to try a new outdoor recreational activity in the next 6 months?
